"Task Two - Rewrite an executable program from JavaScript to C#: In your assessment 3 
repository you will find an executable JavaScript code in the index.js file with 
a specific outcome, your task is to rewrite the same JavaScript program with C# using Visual Studio 2022
andachieve the same outcome."

Requirements and rough idea om how to go about the task.

1. Figure out the layout for how I want the converted code to be output.
2. create the arrays that will be manipulated.
3. create array management function and output the array to console. 
4. work out how many elements are in each array
5. List the maxiumum values in each array one two and three.
6. put the highest 3 elements of each array into one console.writeline array and output that to console.
